EFFECTTEMPLATE.SettingtargetingOnSelect: Replace token targeting with token selection
EFFECTTEMPLATE.SettingtargetingOnSelectH: Replace token targeting with token selection on chat log actions.
EFFECTTEMPLATE.SettingTemplateAutoTarget: Automatically targets the tokens inside of your placed Measured Template.
EFFECTTEMPLATE.SettingTemplateAutoRemove: Auto remove Measured Templates after action
Automatically remove Measured Templates healing or damage from Scene.
